# fishy

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/fishy)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=fishy)
<!-- badges: end -->

fishy enables the `parsnip` package to fit various types of Poisson regression models. 

## Installation

``` r
devtools::install_github("topepo/fishy")
```

## Example

A log-linear model for catgorical data analysis: 

```{r example}
library(fishy)

# 3D contingency table from Agresti (2007): 
poisson_reg() %>% 
  set_engine("glm") %>% 
  fit(count ~ (.)^2, data = seniors)
```
